testcase.name: Filter and add product to cart
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Amazon home page..........................................passed When I navigate to Fashion and then to Mens................................passed And I filter products by price range ₹1,000 - ₹5,000........................passed And I select brands Allen Solly and Puma....................................passed Then I verify the number of search results..................................passed And I add the second product to cart........................................passed And I verify the cart count has increased...................................passed
